channel.title: Refactored 508 HD client
channel.description:
I just thought I'll release this since it was sitting on my hard drive unused for a long time, and I don't have time for RSPS anymore. Basically I've been trying to find how to load all kinds of custom stuff on 508 HD client, and was refactoring it along the way. What I remember that I have refactored there is...: -Custom item models -Custom object models -Custom npc models -Custom GFX models -Custom GFX animations -Custom Character body part models (head, chest, legs, arms etc.) -Custom sprites -Animations -Interfaces -Textures on item, object, npc models -Textures on terrain (ground)
errr can't remember what else, but there's a lot more. For animations, interfaces, textures - I am able to manipulate them from inside the cache, I don't know how to successfully load e.g. texture file from folder, so bare that in mind. If you know how then you will be able to do it with ease, because I found and refactored where it loads the shit, where it looks for that animation, texture or interface in cache so you just have to change it similarly like with custom models to make it load from folder. This also has polygon limit removed, so you can load models with any amount of polygons and they will load fine (previously if model exceeded 2k or something polygons it would become invisible).
It is an Eclipse project, also bare in mind that it is very messy like lots of commented out stuff, might also be some shit printing out I can't remember, so just clean it yourselves. I really can't remember where I left off, because I haven't touched this for months.
[b]Download link:[/b] http://filesmy.com/174gV
Do not, I repeat, do not ask me for anything and do not ask me for help. I haven't touched this for many months and I don't do anything RSPS related anymore. If something doesn't work or if you don't get something, find it out yourselves or ask someone else for help. I'll try to find some pictures and post here, but I cannot guarantee that I will get you some because I don't have eclipse installed right now and I am busy, maybe I have some pics on my hard disk or something so I'll look.
Thanks

[/quote]the difference is that he supposedly released his?

if anyone actually does the survey, upload to some non gay host[/quote]
Wanted to add it to the RS-Hacking.com archive, but it’s clearly bs…

item.title: Refactored 508 HD client
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Just to confirm to anyone who already didnt know, yes its a fake, doesn’t exist.

Tried numerous times to complete serveys (and completed all three), as well as trying to purchase a premium account (does not allow this).

Conclusion: Waste Of Time.

Read full topic

item.title: Refactored 508 HD client
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

[quote=“djoscar, post:3, topic:339916”]Well I uploaded there for a reason, I don’t want to upload to other file hosts

If you’re having trouble getting past the surveys (which is rare case), simply open up any survey and leave it there, go do something else for like 1-2 mins. Then a small gray line should appear on top saying “Download not unlocking? Click here to fix it and get the file.”. Click there and it will allow you to do a really short survey and u will get to download[/quote]
I won’t bother with it then.

eczema3:

I hope everyone realises that this is probably a BS download, as sites like these just make you do survey after survey, never actually showing you what you want. (Also the surveys give the OP cash every time you complete one.)

Read full topic

item.title: Refactored 508 HD client
item.dc:creator: @djoscar djoscar
item.description:
@djoscar wrote:

Well I uploaded there for a reason, I don’t want to upload to other file hosts

If you’re having trouble getting past the surveys (which is rare case), simply open up any survey and leave it there, go do something else for like 1-2 mins. Then a small gray line should appear on top saying “Download not unlocking? Click here to fix it and get the file.”. Click there and it will allow you to do a really short survey and u will get to download

Read full topic
